title: Brown Rice Salad with Turmeric Dressing

ingredients.content: 4 oz carrots, sliced on the bias (½ in.)
8 oz purple fingerling potatoes, sliced (½ in.)
8 oz zucchini, halved lengthwise, sliced (½ in.)
8 oz red bell peppers, diced (½ in.)
5 oz super greens, baby greens salad blend

preparations.content: Place olive oil, turmeric, cumin, mustard seeds, lemon juice and salt into mixing bowl and cook <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place simmering basket onto mixing bowl lid and weigh in rice. Remove simmering basket, rinse rice under cold running water until water runs clear.

Place water into mixing bowl, insert simmering basket with rinsed rice. Set Varoma dish into position and weigh in carrots, purple potatoes and butternut squash, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>28 min/Varoma/speed 3<b>.
Carefully remove Varoma lid, insert Varoma tray and weigh in zucchini and red peppers, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>8 min/Varoma/speed 3<b>.
Place super greens in a large serving bowl. Transfer cooked vegetables and steamed rice into bowl with super greens.
Pour reserved Turmeric Dressing over Brown Rice Salad, to taste. Mix gently to combine and serve warm.
